episodes.title: Everything's Changed
episodes.description: The dream chaser’s jobs are on the line now that the dream world is under the guardianship of a mysterious new hero called “Dreamsmasher.”

episodes.title: Join the Club
episodes.description: After an argument, Z-Blob refuses to follow Mateo back into the waking world, inspiring them to take two very different journeys of self-discovery.

episodes.title: Whack Race 2025
episodes.description: Being bored in the waking world, Mateo spices things up by organizing an off-road dream vehicle race in the dream world.

episodes.title: Dreamocracy
episodes.description: In order to consolidate his power within the dream world, Izzie suggests that Dreamsmasher holds an election to become the legendary dream keeper!

episodes.title: Freak-quencies
episodes.description: After discovering the identity of Dreamsmasher, the dream chasers must figure out a way to stop him before he changes the dream world permanently.

episodes.title: InterFEARence
episodes.description: The dream splitter has an unexpected effect as it throws our dream chasers in different dream frequencies!

episodes.title: Lunia
episodes.description: When Lunia’s true identity is revealed, she regales the dream chasers with the epic story of how she became the legendary dream keeper.

episodes.title: Moving On Up
episodes.description: The dream chasers hunt for Lunia’s hourglass, which they believe will help them defeat the evil Dreamsmasher.

episodes.title: Brainstorm
episodes.description: After locating Lunia’s hourglass, the team heads to the dream world’s sun, which holds more secrets than the object they’re searching for!

episodes.title: Boxed In
episodes.description: Z-Blob returns in a daring rescue to break Mateo out of Dreamsmasher’s “box” and helps him find Lunia’s hourglass!

episodes.title: The Happy App Trap
episodes.description: The Berlin Bright Bureau receives a mysterious package with new “goggles” to help them become more efficient dream chasers, but at what cost?

episodes.title: Mission: Ungoggle-Able
episodes.description: Mateo, Izzie, Zoey, and Cooper are unwilling participants in a sleep study at Happy App Headquarters, and it’s up to the others to break them out!

episodes.title: D-Shock
episodes.description: The gang flees to the wilds of Central Park where they plan their next move against the Brain, and also receive an unexpected visitor.

episodes.title: Robot Fight Club
episodes.description: When our heroes infiltrate the Happy App building to disrupt production they find themselves thrust into a robot fight club where they must compete!

episodes.title: Fish Out of Water
episodes.description: As the team goes to investigate an area of the dream world that scares the Brain, Zoey falls into a strange dimension and an even stranger adventure.

episodes.title: Cyber Drain
episodes.description: After playing a video game that mimics their lives, the dream chasers visit the Cyber Realm to learn how to beat the final boss and defeat Happy App.

episodes.title: School Spirit
episodes.description: Nova sends out an S.O.S. that has the dream chasers rushing to her rescue and straight into a trap!

episodes.title: The Undreamt
episodes.description: Our heroes have no choice but to ask The Undreamnt to help them in their fight against D-Shock and the Happy App.

episodes.title: Missing Pieces
episodes.description: Working with the dangerous UNDREAMT, our heroes must use its creative chaotic energy to try and bring life back to the unsaturated dream world.

episodes.title: Outside the Box
episodes.description: The dream chasers are faced with the Brain’s Final Protocol, to box the dream world for all of eternity.
